title: OhO jagadIshanE
sahitya:
OhO jagadIshanE ODi oLivadEnO nEsanE


anupallavi

  EkA hE jaganmOhanA mana dHaham dAham shOkam shOkam


caraNam    ArvamAik-kUvinEn Aviyin AviyE Abattirk-udaviDum amara sanjIviyE pAril anAdi nAn
parivu koLvAi nIyE bhAram unmEl vaittEn endAyE paramA paramA muraiyO muraiyO
